data.title: Speaker Session / Tech Talk - Virtual
data.subtitle: Info Session on Spark AR
data.desc: Augmented Reality is the future. Using Ar effects to increase the reach and engage fans, customers, clients is the new normal for top global artists, brans and companies. In collaboration with GDSC, Reskill x Spark AR will conduct an info sesson on Spark AR on 12th Nov, Friday, 6:30PM Speaker - Kshitiz Saini, ASsociate Developer, Reskill technoogies.
